attributes.action: legislate that all Local Authorities provide reusable energy to their housing and housing association stocks by fitting Solar Panels and/or wind turbines to all properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By providing solar energy and/or wind turbines to all local authority and housing association housing stock, we would reduce the carbon emissions, save the need for circa 3 new power stations and ensure the environment was protected.  In addition, the use of extensive solar power and wind energy by this sector, would provide assistance to reduce costs to other householders across the UK and put the pressure on other householders to look at their own CO2 usage.
